dialogueTree.title: Perception (Smell): "The smell... It's awful and familia..."
dialogueTree.text: The smell... It's awful and familiar.

links.title: You: "Hold on, that *is* awful. (Cover yo..."
links.text: Hold on, that *is* awful. (Cover your nose.)

links.title: Perception (Smell): "It doesn't help. You can still smel..."
links.text: It doesn't help. You can still smell it.

links.title: Endurance: "Keep it in now. Don't overreact. Br..."
links.text: Keep it in now. Don't overreact. Breathe.

links.title: You: "What is it?"
links.text: What is it?

links.title: Perception (Smell): "You've never smelled anything this..."
links.text: You've never smelled anything this bad before. It's pungent, but with a faintly cloying sweetness like cheap perfume on Death itself.

links.title: Half Light: "Something cold wakes in the pit of..."
links.text: Something cold wakes in the pit of your stomach: fear.

links.title: Logic: "It *is* death. It must be."
links.text: It *is* death. It must be.

links.title: You: ""Kim, what's that smell?""
links.text: "Kim, what's that smell?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant has already brought..."
links.text: The lieutenant has already brought a handkerchief to his nose.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Eyes up, detective. Something's no..."
links.text: "Eyes up, detective. Something's not right here."

links.title: You: ""Heads up, lieutenant. Something's..."
links.text: "Heads up, lieutenant. Something's not right here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant has already brought..."
links.text: The lieutenant has already brought a handkerchief to his nose.

links.title: You: "Goddamnit..."
links.text: Goddamnit...

links.title: Perception (Smell): "A sense of dread washes over you as..."
links.text: A sense of dread washes over you as you look ahead.

links.title: You: "It's a dead corpse isn't it?"
links.text: It's a dead corpse isn't it?

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Yes. A sense of dread washes over y..."
links.text: Yes. A sense of dread washes over you as you look ahead.

links.title: You: "I don't want to be here."
links.text: I don't want to be here.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The signs of decaying meat. It anno..."
links.text: The signs of decaying meat. It announces itself from two dozen metres away. A warning, a *memento mori*.

links.title: You: "Isn't it just the rotting fish?"
links.text: Isn't it just the rotting fish?

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Don't be naive."
links.text: Don't be naive.

links.title: You: "Oh no..."
links.text: Oh no...

links.title: You: "What is it then?"
links.text: What is it then?

links.title: Perception (Smell): "No, it's much worse than that."
links.text: No, it's much worse than that.
